subject: App Crash Report
body: Dear Team, the app crashes on my Samsung Galaxy S21 running Android 14. Steps: Open app → tap Add Task → crash.

subject: Login Issue
body: Hi, I cannot login since the last update on my iPhone 14 (iOS 17). Please help.

subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
body: Hello team, I would really appreciate a dark mode option for night usage.

subject: Suggestion for Improvement
body: It would be great if you could add calendar integration with Google Calendar.

subject: Data Loss Problem
body: Formal complaint: My tasks disappeared after syncing across devices. Device: OnePlus 11, Android 13.

subject: General Feedback
body: Love the app so far, works smoothly for my daily planning.

subject: App Crash Report
